item.title: New Development Version - 1.0.8a1
item.author: bytubed@gmail.com (M S Ram)
item.description: A new development version (1.0.8a1) is up for trying. This version shows Clip Length along with Title and other columns in the section window. Please see the Development section to install the new version.

item.title: Site Changes
item.author: bytubed@gmail.com (M S Ram)
item.description:
• Added RSS feeds for News
  • Added a FaceBook Like button near the description
  • Added ShareThis buttons that float on the left side

item.title: New Version - 1.0.8
item.author: bytubed@gmail.com (M S Ram)
item.description: This is not really a new version in that it does not add any new features above 1.0.7. It just fixes some issues reported with 1.0.7. Rest is just the same.

item.title: BYTubeD - Issues in 1.0.7
item.author: bytubed@gmail.com (M S Ram)
item.description: Please see the Issues & Fixes section.

item.title: Site Changes
item.author: bytubed@gmail.com (M S Ram)
item.description:
• News section has been added in the Home page.
  • The "Keyboard Shortcuts" page has been merged into the Help page
  • Help page has been split into two: FAQ and Help
  • Development page has been split into two: Issues & Fixes and Development
